text: Lage is a community on the river Dinkel in the County of Bentheim in Lower Saxony with about 1,000 residents. It belongs to the Joint Community (Samtgemeinde) of Neuenhaus. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official page *Page about Lage and its sightseeing *Dorf-, Burg- und Mühlenfreunde Lage e. V. (“Lage Village, Castle and Mill Friends”) Category:County of Bentheim (district)
title: Lage, Lower Saxony
